title: Sabotage
timing: When another player plays an action card other than "Sabotage"
effect: Cancel that action card.

title: Cripple Defenses
effect: Destroy each PDS on that planet.

title: Ancient Burial Sites
timing: At the start of the agenda phase
effect: Choose 1 player. Exhaust each cultural planet owned by that player.

title: Imperial Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 victory point.

title: Fire Team
timing: After your ground forces make combat rolls during a round of ground combat
effect: Reroll any number of your dice.

title: Courageous to the End
timing: After 1 of your ships is destroyed during a space combat
effect: Roll 2 dice. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, your opponent must choose and destroy 1 of their ships.

title: Political Stability
timing: When you would return your strategy card(s) during the status phase
effect: Do not return your strategy card(s). You do not choose strategy cards during the next strategy phase.

title: Public Disgrace
timing: When another player chooses a strategy card during the strategy phase
effect: That player must choose a different strategy card instead, if able.

title: Archaeological Expedition
effect: Reveal the top 3 cards of an exploration deck that matches a planet you control; gain any relic fragments that you revealed and discard the rest.

title: Assassinate Representative
effect: Choose 1 player. That player cannot vote on this agenda.

title: Bribery
timing: After the speaker votes on an agenda
effect: Spend any number of trade goods. For each trade good spent, cast 1 additional vote for the outcome on which you voted.

title: Bunker
timing: At the start of an invasion
effect: During this invasion, apply -4 to the result of each Bombardment roll against planets you control.

title: Confusing Legal Text
timing: When you are elected as the outcome of an agenda
effect: Choose 1 player. That player is the elected player instead.

title: Construction Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 1 space dock from your reinforcements on a planet you control.

title: Diplomacy Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, choose 1 system that contains a planet you control. Each other player places a command token from their reinforcements in that system.

title: Direct Hit
timing: After another player's ship uses Sustain Damage to cancel a hit produced by your units or abilities
effect: Destroy that ship.

title: Disable
timing: At the start of an invasion in a system that contains 1 or more of your opponents' PDS units
effect: Your opponents' PDS units lose Planetary Shield and Space Cannon during this invasion.

title: Distinguished Councilor
timing: After you cast votes on an outcome of an agenda
effect: Cast 5 additional votes for that outcome.

title: Economic Initiative
effect: Ready each cultural planet you control.

title: Emergency Repairs
timing: At the start or end of a combat round
effect: Repair all of your units that have Sustain Damage in the active system

title: Experimental Battlestation
timing: After another player moves ships into a system during a tactical action
effect: Choose 1 of your space docks that is either in or adjacent to that system. That space dock uses Space Cannon 5 (x3) against ships in the active system.

title: Fighter Prototype
timing: At the start of the first round of a space combat
effect: Apply +2 to the result of each of your fighters' combat rolls during this combat round.

title: Flank Speed
effect: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships during this tactical action.

title: Focused Research
effect: Spend 4 trade goods to research 1 technology.

title: Frontline Deployment
effect: Place 3 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

title: Ghost Ship
effect: Place 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a non-home system that contains a wormhole and does not contain other players' ships.

title: In The Silence Of Space
effect: Choose 1 system. During this tactical action, your ships in the chosen system can move through systems that contain other players' ships.

title: Industrial Initiative
effect: Gain 1 trade good for each industrial planet you control.

title: Infiltrate
timing: When you gain control of a planet
effect: Replace each PDS and space dock that is on that planet with a matching unit from your reinforcements.

title: Insubordination
effect: Remove 1 token from another player's tactic pool and return it to their reinforcements.

title: Intercept
timing: After your opponent declares a retreat during a space combat
effect: Your opponent cannot retreat during this round of space combat.

title: Leadership Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 3 command tokens.

title: Lost Star Chart
effect: During this tactical action, systems that contain alpha and beta wormholes are adjacent to each other.

title: Lucky Shot
effect: Destroy 1 dreadnought, cruiser, or destroyer in a system that contains a planet you control.

title: Maneuvering Jets
timing: Before you assign hits produced by another player's Space Cannon roll
effect: Cancel 1 hit.

title: Mining Initiative
effect: Gain trade goods equal to the resource value of 1 planet you control.

title: Morale Boost
timing: At the start of a combat round
effect: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round.

title: Parley
timing: After another player commits units to land on a planet you control
effect: Return the committed units to the space area.

title: Plague
timing: Action: Choose 1 planet that is controlled by another player
effect: Roll 1 die for each infantry on that planet. For each result of 6 or greater, destroy 1 of those units.

title: Politics Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 3 action cards and gain the speaker token.

title: Reactor Meltdown
effect: Destroy 1 space dock in a non-home system.

title: Reparations
timing: After another player gains control of a planet you control
effect: Exhaust 1 planet that player controls and ready 1 planet you control.

title: Repeal Law
effect: Discard 1 law from play.

title: Rise of a Messiah
effect: Place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on each planet you control.

title: Salvage
timing: After you win a space combat
effect: Your opponent gives you all of their commodities.

title: Shields Holding
timing: Before you assign hits to your ships during a space combat
effect: Cancel up to 2 hits.

title: Signal Jamming
effect: Chose 1 non-home system that contains or is adjacent to 1 of your ships. Place a command token from another player's reinforcements in that system.

title: Skilled Retreat
timing: At the start of a combat round
effect: Move all of your ships from the active system into an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; the space combat ends in a draw. Then, place a command token from your reinforcements in that system.

title: Spy
effect: Choose 1 player. That player gives you 1 random action card from their hand.

title: Summit
timing: At the start of the strategy phase
effect: Gain 2 command tokens.

title: Tactical Bombardment
effect: Choose 1 system that contains 1 or more of your units that have Bombardment. Exhaust each planet controlled by other players in that system.

title: Technology Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, research 1 technology.

title: Trade Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 5 trade goods.

title: Unexpected Action
effect: Remove 1 of your command tokens from the game board and return it to your reinforcements.

title: Unstable Planet
effect: Choose 1 hazardous planet. Exhaust that planet and destroy up to 3 infantry on it.

title: Upgrade
timing: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your ships
effect: Replace one of your cruisers in that system with one of your dreadnoughts from your reinforcements.

title: Uprising
effect: Exhaust 1 non-home planet controlled by another player. Then gain trade goods equal to its resource value.

title: Veto
effect: Discard that agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead.

title: War Effort
effect: Place 1 cruiser from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.

title: Warfare Rider
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, place 1 dreadnought from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.

title: Confounding Legal Text
timing: When another player is elected as the result of an agenda
effect: You are elected instead.

title: Coup D'Etat
timing: When another player would perform a strategic action
effect: End that player's turn; the strategic action is not resolved and the strategy card is not exhausted.

title: Deadly Plot
timing: During the agenda phase, when an outcome would be resolved
effect:
If you voted for or predicted another outcome, discard the agenda instead; the agenda is resolved with no effect and it is not replaced.
 Then, exhaust all of your planets.

title: Decoy Operation
timing: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your structures
effect: Remove up to 2 of your ground forces from the game board and place them on a planet you control in the active system.

title: Diplomatic Pressure
effect: Choose another player; that player must give you 1 promissory note from their hand.

title: Divert Funding
effect: Return a non-unit upgrade, non-faction technology that you own to your technology deck. Then, research another technology.

title: Exploration Probe
effect: Explore a frontier token that is in or adjacent to a system that contains 1 or more of your ships.

title: Manipulate Investments
timing: At the start of the Strategy Phase
effect: Place a total of 5 Trade Goods from the supply on strategy cards of your choice; you must place these tokens on at least 3 different cards.

title: Nav Suite
effect: During the "Movement" step of this tactical action, ignore the effects of anomalies.

title: Refit Troops
effect: Choose 1 or 2 of your infantry on the game board; replace each of those infantry with mechs.

title: Reveal Prototype
timing: At the start of a combat
effect: Spend 4 resources to research a unit upgrade technology of the same type as 1 of your units that is participating in this combat.

title: Reverse Engineer
timing: When another player discards an action card that has a component action
effect: Take that action card from the discard pile.

title: Rout
timing: At the start of the "Announce Retreats" step of space combat, if you are the defender
effect: Your opponent must announce a retreat, if able.

title: Scuttle
effect: Choose 1 or 2 of your non-fighter ships on the game board and return them to your reinforcements; gain trade goods equal to the combined cost of those ships.

title: Seize Artifact
effect: Choose 1 of your neighbors that has 1 or more relic fragments. That player must give you 1 relic fragment of your choice.

title: Waylay
timing: Before you roll dice for ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE
effect: Hits from this roll are produced against all ships (not just fighters).

title: Blitz
timing: At the start of an invasion
effect: Each of your non-fighter ships in the active system that do not have BOMBARDMENT gain BOMBARDMENT 6 until the end of the invasion

title: Counterstroke
timing: After a player activates a system that contains 1 of your command tokens
effect: Return that command token to your tactic pool

title: Fighter Conscription
effect: Place 1 fighter from your reinforcements in each system that contains 1 or more of your space docks or units that have capacity; they cannot be placed in systems that contain other players' ships

title: Forward Supply Base
timing: After another player activates a system that contains your units
effect: Gain 3 trade goods. Then, choose another player to gain 1 trade good

title: Ghost Squad
timing: After a player commits units to land on a planet you control
effect: Move any number of ground forces from any planet you control in the active system to any other planet you control in the active system

title: Hack Election
effect: During this agenda, voting begins with the player to the right of the speaker and continues counterclockwise

title: Harness Energy
effect: Replenish your commodities

title: Impersonation
effect: Spend 3 influence to draw 1 secret objective

title: Insider Information
effect: Look at the top card of the agenda deck

title: Master Plan
effect: You may perform an additional action this turn

title: Plagiarize
effect: Spend 5 influence and choose a non-faction technology owned by 1 of your neighbours; gain that technology

title: Rally
timing: After you activate a system that contains another player's ships
effect: Place 2 command tokens from your reinforcements in your fleet pool

title: Reflective Shielding
timing: When one of your ships uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE during combat
effect: Produce 2 hits against your opponent's ships in the active system

title: Sanction
effect: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, each player that voted for that outcome returns 1 command token from their fleet supply to their reinforcements

title: Scramble Frequency
timing: After another player makes a BOMBARDMENT, SPACE CANNON or ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE roll
effect: That player re-rolls all of their dice

title: Solar Flare
effect: During this movement, other players cannot use SPACE CANNON against your ships

title: War Machine
timing: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION
effect: Apply +4 to the total Production value of your units and reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 1
